keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

unmapAll


map ?? showHelp

map e scrollUp
map d scrollDown

map U scrollPageUp
map J scrollPageDown
map 9 scrollToTop
map 0 scrollToBottom

map CC copyCurrentUrl

map ii focusInput

map ñ LinkHints.activateMode
map Ñ LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab

map o Vomnibar.activate
map O Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map T Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map > moveTabLeft
map < moveTabRight

map h goForward
map H goBack

map g9 firstTab
map g0 lastTab
